# June 1st

## running custom contexts locally

if sso/common auth is _not_ required then you can just run block brochure locally and visit `https://localhost:8443/a/find/<context>`

if sso/common auth _is_ required then you have to run both block brochure and traffic director locally and visit `https://localhost.awardselect.com:8443/<context>` also need to set commonauth env variables found below.

```
export commonauth_server_users=https://users-jam-stg.alamoapp.octanner.io
export commonauth_server_auth=https://fedstg.octanner.io
export commonauth_redirect_uri=https://localhost.awardselect.com:8443/t/common/Auth
export commonauth_client_id=y_localhost_career_achievement_ui
export commonauth_app_auth_uri=https://acp.awardselect.com/a
export commonauth_client_secret=<client secret>
export commonauth_yb_login_url=https://localhost.awardselect.com:8443/a/commonauth/login
export commonauth_domain=awardselect.com

export commonauth_public_

export commonauth_private_
```

# June 4th

## A/B testing libraries

* [ab.js](http://aptonic.github.io/ab.js/)
* [Content Experiments](https://developers.google.com/analytics/solutions/experiments-client-side)
